channel.title: I need help

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @dedripper dedripper
item.description:
@dedripper wrote:

lol you dont need the true look at it this way

if you have if(playerHasItemAmount(ItemID, amount)) {

thats like saying if you have this do this

if you have if(playerHasItemAmount(ItemID, amount) == true)

thats like saying if you have this and its a true statement do this whic dosent make much sense… and for the else part thats how i want it… and as for the other part i dont want a sendmessage i want dialogue it looks neater and i know it works so can someone plz help me figure out why it isnt working properly

Read full topic

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Isn’t it:

if(playerHasItemAmount(ItemID, amount) == true) { //True part is just there for reasons unknown 2 me.

Oh and also you second else doesn’t make sense to me…

If the player doesn’t have the item amount, you supposed to put:

sendMessage(“You don’t have 3 frog tokens”);
} else if(q3stage != 1) {
sendMessage(“your not that far in the quest”);
} else {
w/e

item.title: I need help
item.dc:creator: @dedripper dedripper
item.description:
@dedripper wrote:

hmmm i made this

[code]case 2145:
if(HasItemAmount(6183, 3)) {
deleteItem(6183, GetItemSlot(6183), 3);
teleportToX = 3235;
teleportToY = 3197;

} else if(!HasItemAmount(6183, 3) || q3stage != 1) {
sendFrame164(4282);
sendFrame126("@blu@ the coffin says:", 4283);
sendFrame126("@red@FEED ME THREE FROG TOKENS!!!", 4284);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
sendMessage(“this magic coffin requires three magic frog tokens to operate”);
sendMessage(“to find theese i suggest you kill some frogs”);

} else
sendMessage(“check your quest log for more info”);
break;[/code]

and compiled but when i get the three frog tokens and click on the object it says the feed me three frog tokens bit can anyone help?

Read full topic
